item.title: Our first speakers announced
item.description:
Mobile Era is proud to announce the first part of our speaker lineup. Here are some of the confirmed speakers:

  • Keynote by Vitaly Friedman, the editor of Smashing Magazine
  • John Sundell, iOS team lead at Spotify
  • Wei-Meng Lee, iOS and Android Instructor and author of Android Application Development Cookbook and many more books
  • Kostiantyn Koval, author of Swift High Performance
  • Michael May
  • Orta Therox
  • Alexsander Akers
  • Android bootcamp workshop with Christoffer Marcussen and Sindre Nordbø.

We are looking forward to these and many more awesome speakers in November at Mobile Era.

item.title: First tickets
item.description:
We have released the first tickets to Mobile Era Conference 2016!

As the program is not yet set, we are calling the first 50 tickets Blind Bird tickets. We sell these tickets with a big discount! This is a really cheap way to get two days of excellent content (we promise) as well as an awesome conference party!

Facebook post.

item.title: Call for Papers
item.description:
Mobile Era will feature a mix of international and Norwegian speakers with a focus on the international crowd. The conference will give most space to experienced speakers who are experienced in speaking on their subjects, but will leave some room for more novice speakers as well.

If you are experienced in presenting a technical or design topic within mobile, we would like to hear from you. Send us a proposal below, tweet at us, or send an email.

The conference will reimburse speaker travel and hotel costs. If you want, we can also help you organize for-pay workshops during your stay in Oslo

Formats

  • 45 minute talks
  • 10 minute lightning talks

Language

  • English
  • Norwegian

Themes and topics – what do we expect?

  • iOS
  • Android
  • Hybrid/Mobile Web
  • Windows Phone
  • Mobile UX/Design
  • Mobile tech

Please submit your proposals here.

Deadline is August 15, 2016

Talk selection is September 15, 2016

Any questions?

Email organizers at contact@mobileera.rocks
